name: Jǫkull
description:
Jǫkull is a small exploration game made by two students for a level design school project. Explore a small area in the Norwegian mountain range and experience a deep and intricate story. The game portays themes like inverted  gender roles and infidelity.

We hope you enjoy this little adventure game. Please leave a comment, we appreciate both criticism and praise.        

How to play: Use WASD to move around and Right-click to zoom. As simple as that!
